name: Kansei Drifto
description:
N-NANI? ONE BUTTON DORIFTO? MASAKA!

Learn to drift. Crash often. Chase your highscore. Get into the zone.

All you need is one button - any button - to steer. Drifting to the MAX!!!

Unlock a variety of cars, game modes and songs.

Drift safely.

Parental advisory: violence, blood, explosions.
